name: FSF Common Ship Blueprint
desc: Allow to produce common FSF ships

name: FSF Rare Ship Blueprint
desc: Allow to produce rare FSF ships

name: S-1 Cruise Missile
desc:
S-series of cruise missile are remote controlled, frigate sized, campaign level weapon, after launch it will search the closest hostile fleet within 60 degrees of its heading.

S-1 warhead contain massive amount of fragments that will be heated into plasmoid before being dispersed in a wide area, melting enemy armor in a wide range.

name: S-2 Cruise Missile
desc:
S-series of cruise missile are remote controlled, frigate sized, campaign level weapon, after launch it will search the closest hostile fleet within 60 degrees of its heading.

S-2 warhead contains a shaped charge that focuses all its power in one point, it is adapt at using high speed to penetrate enemy fleet defense to allow pin point destruction of select targets.
